pyramid_versionbadge
====================


0.3 (2018-12-03)
----------------

- Add support for Python 3. Remove (official) support for Python 2.


0.2 (2013-12-04)
----------------

- add second setting for css class

- enable badge per default

- possibility to set css class

- tests


0.1 (2013-12-03)
----------------

- initial release
